title: Clean up old sccache log before build
body_html: Since the macOS workers are static, we need to make sure that the old sccache logs are removed before starting a new build, otherwise errors from old build will mistakenly show up in new ones (e.g. https://ci.pytorch.org/jenkins/job/pytorch-builds/job/pytorch-macos-10.13-cuda9.2-cudnn7-py3-build/58/consoleFull)
body_text: Since the macOS workers are static, we need to make sure that the old sccache logs are removed before starting a new build, otherwise errors from old build will mistakenly show up in new ones (e.g. https://ci.pytorch.org/jenkins/job/pytorch-builds/job/pytorch-macos-10.13-cuda9.2-cudnn7-py3-build/58/consoleFull)
body: Since the macOS workers are static, we need to make sure that the old sccache logs are removed before starting a new build, otherwise errors from old build will mistakenly show up in new ones (e.g. https://ci.pytorch.org/jenkins/job/pytorch-builds/job/pytorch-macos-10.13-cuda9.2-cudnn7-py3-build/58/consoleFull)
